questions.question: What is the primary function of an operating system?
choices: To manage hardware resources and provide services to software
questions.answer: To manage hardware resources and provide services to software

questions.question: Which component of a computer is responsible for processing graphics and images?
What is the purpose of a URL (Uniform Resource Locator)?
choices: To identify a specific file on a computer
To specify a location on a map
To uniquely identify a resource on the internet
questions.answer: To uniquely identify a resource on the internet

choices: To provide temporary storage for data and programs

choices: To filter and monitor network traffic for security purposes
